detaileddescription.para: This constructor sets up the Routing window. It loads Icons, initializes sizers and creates the shapes of the different routing elements (e.g., devices and boxes).

parameterdescription.para: parent Window as used in wxWidgets.
positions of the window (if unset use application default)
size of the window (if unset use the application default).

briefdescription.para: fills the window with the corresponding shapes.

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to initialize the window with the current routing information. It creates the shapes for devices, routes and new objects.

parameterdescription.para: (wxSizerFlages &) Sizer flags, which shall be applied
(wxSizerFlages &) Sizer flags, which shall be applied
(wxSizerFlages &) Sizer flags, which shall be applied

detaileddescription.para: This function opens a file open dialog in order to load a route configuration from disk storage. event (wxCommandEvent) event to be processed
This function saves the current routing conifiguriton into a file on disk storage. event (wxCommandEvent) event to be processed

briefdescription.para: save routes with a new file name

detaileddescription.para: This function opens a file save dialog in order to save a route configuration to disk storage. event (wxCommandEvent) event to be processed
This function should not be called from outside the class. It's here, because C++ does not allow partial specialisation of functions.

parameterdescription.para: New position where the shape shall be dropped.
Sizer that is responsible for the dropped window
